details.name: description
details.old_value:
We actually use "coverity":https://scan.coverity.com/projects/1160 as static analysis tool to improve quality of our codebase, and monitor the introduction of new bugs. According to the size of our current codebase, we're allowed 2 scans/day max and 8 scans/week max.

Scans are actually triggered manually by myself about each 1-2 days with "this script":http://dev.etlegacy.com/projects/etlegacy/wiki/Spyhawks_notes#Coverity-scan-script, but it might be wise to completely automate this task with a cron job on our server.

A scan requires pull the last code from git, run the script which will compile the code, create some files and send them to coverity for analysis.
